title: Roast beef and potatoes
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What did the writer have for dinner?
听录音，然后回答问题。作者晚餐吃了什么？

text_and_translation.text: I had roast beef and potatoes for dinner.
text_and_translation.translation: 我晚餐吃了烤牛肉和土豆。

notes.title: Roast beef and potatoes
notes.describe: 这是一种常见的英国传统晚餐，通常在周日享用。
